General.Name: Focus Hotmelt Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Focus Hotmelt Company Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of special hot melt adhesives for absorbent hygiene products in China. The company offers sanitary hot melt adhesives, such as structural, rubber band, backing, and special adhesives. Its products are used in the bonding of the surface layers, absorbent layers, bottom layers, and other constituent materials of absorbent sanitary products, such as sanitary napkins and diapers. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in Guangzhou, China.
